entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY EARLY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
ISOLATED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE GUSTY WINDS AND SMALL HAIL IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
